name: Tempeh Chili Roast - Kerala Style
description: Allergen Information: Dairy, egg, corn, gluten free.
recipeIngredient: 4 oz Tempeh chopped into small cubes.
1/2 teaspoon red chili powder or to taste
a generous pinch of cardamom powder
1 teaspoon virgin coconut oil or organic canola oil
1/3 cup chopped white or red onion
2  green chilies slit lengthwise or to taste
1 teaspoon ginger finely chopped or paste
1 teaspoon garlic finely chopped or paste
1/2 teaspoon red chili powder or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Dry roast the spices under Dry-roast for 2-3 minutes on low-medium in a pan. Grind and keep
recipeInstructions.name: Dry roast the spices under Dry-roast for 2-3 minutes on low-medium in a pan. Grind and keep

recipeInstructions.text: Mix everything under Marinade in a medium pan, and add the dry roasted spice mix to it. (You can let the tempeh marinate in this mix for an hour before cooking if you like.)
recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything under Marinade in a medium pan, and add the dry roasted spice mix to it. (You can let the tempeh marinate in this mix for an hour before cooking if you like.)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Tempeh, covered, on low until all the liquid is absorbed and just about dry(20+ minutes). Stir 2-3 times in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Tempeh, covered, on low until all the liquid is absorbed and just about dry(20+ minutes). Stir 2-3 times in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, in a medium pan, add oil and heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, in a medium pan, add oil and heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped onions and shallots to the oil and cook until brown (12-15 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add chopped onions and shallots to the oil and cook until brown (12-15 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the ginger, garlic, curry leaves, green chili. Mix and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the ginger, garlic, curry leaves, green chili. Mix and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chili powder(or add this later to taste), and soy sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chili powder(or add this later to taste), and soy sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and add the Tempeh coated with the spices to this mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and add the Tempeh coated with the spices to this mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well and cook until dry.(4-6 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well and cook until dry.(4-6 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and spice level. Add cayenne if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and spice level. Add cayenne if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve sizzling hot garnished with chopped scallions. Serve with Daal and Rice or make a wrap with Naan, lettuce, salsa.
